Package org.apache.mina.filter.stream

Stream based IoFilter implementation.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractStreamWriteFilter<T> TODO Add documentation
FileRegionWriteFilter Filter implementation that converts a FileRegion to IoBuffer objects and writes those buffers to the next filter.
StreamWriteFilter Filter implementation which makes it possible to write InputStream objects directly using IoSession#write(Object).
 

Package org.apache.mina.filter.stream Description

Stream based IoFilter implementation.
